verbs.description: John McCann and Steve Lonegan [V: are] singing the praises of Donald Trump in the final days of the GOP primary in New Jersey 's 5th congressional district .
[ARG0: John McCann and Steve Lonegan] are [V: singing] [ARG1: the praises of Donald Trump] [ARGM-LOC: in the final days of the GOP primary in New Jersey 's 5th congressional district] .
